channel.title: A List of things I need help with. [317]
channel.description:
Like what the title says.
[u][b][Things I need help with][/b][/u] Make doors work. Remove PK in Edgeville Remove PK Points When I do ::pickup command it doesn't take item ID's that have more than 5 ID's
*Note:If one of the things in my list is crossed out that means its done and I don't need a tutorial on that.

item.title: A List of things I need help with. [317]
item.dc:creator: @LahainaGeneration LahainaGeneration
item.description:
@LahainaGeneration wrote:

sk8rdude461:

Remove Pk in Edgeville: Go to your client.java and search for: public boolean NonWild. then go to the bottom of that list of codes. copy one past it under the last one, and change the 2 sets of X coords and Y coords.

Please be rewrite and be more specific on removing the Edgeville PK I can’t understand “copy on past it under the last one, and change the 2 sets of X coords and Y coords”

Read full topic
item.source: A List of things I need help with. [317]

item.title: A List of things I need help with. [317]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Thank you for posting this. this was exactly what i was talking about. but i will try and help you aswell.
For doors: I dont know.
Remove Pk in Edgeville: Go to your client.java and search for: public boolean NonWild. then go to the bottom of that list of codes. copy one past it under the last one, and change the 2 sets of X coords and Y coords.
Remove Pk points: Idk
::pickup: SGT is right. there is no item thats more then 5 digits. if you want max money you usually have to type ::pickup 00995 2147000000

Read full topic
item.source: A List of things I need help with. [317]

item.title: A List of things I need help with. [317]
item.dc:creator: @SGTCannon SGTCannon
item.description:
@SGTCannon wrote:

  1. Doors.cfg in your configuration folder.
  2. I’m not honestly sure, I thought it was in clickingmost, but I’m probably wrong.
  3. Its in client.java, just search for pk points or something and remove it, and remove its class at the top.
  4. There are no items that have ID’s greater than 99999 unless you make it is, and you have to set it as a long if the ID is greater than 5. Just save yourself the hassle and leave it as under 99999.

Read full topic

item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Make Doors work by going into config folder and clicking doors.cfg then adding the door.
